column5: Now we're talkin!!  Don't have to get out of the covers to make the coffee  http://techcrunch.com/2009/04/13/wearable-sleeping-bag-puts-snuggie-to-shame/
Wonder if they'd be good for ice fishing Nick  Nice and toasty warm
You still have to peel out of it to do your morning constitutional
I'm not sure how i feel about these, the idea is neat but I'm not sure if i can see myself using one
Cool. Reminds me of the time I went to Lakair.  I had a cold and was sleeping in a tent.  It was 0 Deg so I slept in my float suit.  It sure Helped me make it though.
Don't complain on day 2 that you're hypothermic.. from all the moisture trapped in the bag!
It would make for a good Michelin Man for halloween costume
German army surplus bags are pretty much the same ( 15 years ago ) when I was last in the market for a winter bag
I wish my mummy bag had arms and legs, lol!
Seeing you in one of those things would be worth the price. I'm buying you one.
Seeing you in one of those things would be worth the price. I'm buying you one.  IT'S A ZOMBIE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!   (That is until I got my morning coffee, lol!)
